item.title: BO - International - Tax Rules - CRUD Tax rules group
item.description: BO - International - Tax Rules - CRUD Tax rules group Details Component : Core Status : IN REVIEW Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1030 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Taxes > Tax Rules tab Tax Rules page is displayed Click to “Add new tax rules group” Add new Tax rules page is displayed Fill all information > Click on “Save and stay” Successful creation notification
